description.narrative: We Effect is a decentralised organisation where development cooperation is managed at regional level. The main functions of the regional office are to provide technical assistance, ensure that development cooperation is being carried out in adherence with We Effect strategy, monitor and evaluate the effects of We Effect support, and ensure that internal control systems are adhered to, both within We Effect and partner organisations. The project supports the quality assurance of We Effect's development cooperation in the Europe region.

• In 2018, the We Effect Europe Regional Office went through a process of changing and expansion of its team, aiming at strengthening the capacities of the We Effect Europe Region to ensure that development cooperation is carried out in adherence with the We Effect Strategy. Since 3 September 2018, Ms. Anneli Leina took over the position of Regional Director. In addition, new Programme Officer for Gender Equality and Minorities is engaged along with a Resource Mobilisation Officer in Macedonia and a new Liaison Officer in Moldova. The position of Financial Controller was also filled in. • We Effect Europe conducted 2 partner meetings to introduce the new team and to discuss ongoing activities within the programme and the respective projects implemented by the partners, as well as to discuss the future activities related to the implementation of the programme. • An Octagon Assessment was conducted for 6 partner organisations and Action Plans for Organisational Development of all the partners were developed in close cooperation with the partner organisations, based on the findings of the Octagon Assessment and external evaluations. • Partner Risk Management Plans were developed for all partner organisations. • We Effect Europe team has started the process of Capacity Assessment of new potential partner organisations in Kosovo, using the newly adopted Capacity Assessment Format. • Gender Equality in Rural Development (GERD) project has been developed. The GERD project is a Regional Project aiming to directly contribute to the achievement of one of the main objectives of the We Effect Global strategy. Within the frame of the GERD Project, We Effect Europe was represented through the Programme Officer for Gender Equality and two partner organisations from Macedonia (National Federation of Farmers and National Roma Centrum) at the CEDAW Committee in United Nations in Geneva on the review process of Macedonia. Prior the official attendance to the session of CEDAW, the We Effect partners in Macedonia prepared and submitted shadow reports on the situation of Rural Women and Roma Women in Macedonia. • In order to support the partners in the process of strengthening their capacities for diversification of funding, We Effect Europe team established the Regional Resource Mobilisation Thematic Group (RRMTG) that will be coordinated by the We Effect Resource Mobilisation Officer. All partner organisations have nominated their representatives in the RRMTG. The first meeting / training of the RRMTG is scheduled for the last week of November 2018.

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
Planned start date of the activity
